BandIt.name: BandIt

params.name: diveditor
params.description: Name of the div where editor will be put

constructors.description: BandIt is a library above RaphaelJS to create workflows in HTML/JS.

params.name: callback
params.description: Function to use when a node is deleted, function(nodeid)

registerDelete.description: Register a callback when a node is deleted

params.name: callback
params.description: Function to use when a node is selected, function(nodeid, nodeproperties)

registerSelect.description: Register a callback when a node is selected

setProperties.description: Update the properties of a node

params.name: callback
params.description: Function to use when a node is added, function(nodeid)

registerAdd.description: Register a callback when a node is added

mode.description:
Operation mode:
0 : drag and drop, selection
1 : link
2 : delete

BandIt.description: BandIt is a library above RaphaelJS to create workflows in HTML/JS.

The BandIt module provides methods to draw a workflow
